review: I'm a road warrior and wanted a way to watch TV in hotel rooms without hauling cables and speakers. I tried ChromecCast and, even with several calls to IT to push my device through, was unable to connect to the Internet. I ordered Fire Stick and was streaming movies within 10 minutes... So easy and inexpensive!
author: Caryn Colgan "Caryn"

author: Kareem Borrego

review: Small and portable, plugs right into the TV and had no issue working.  I particularly like this unit since I have a toddler and when we go to relatives who do not have small children I can bring this along and hook up quickly (at least after it has been on their network once) and stream shows for him.
author: JP

review: This Fire Stick + being a Prime member gives me enough viewing options that I disconnected Cable from the TV. Also, Amazon has some excellent TV shows for kids that are only available through Amazon.
author: John F. Colgan

review: Great combo with prime. Better than cable or Directv
author: John J. Francis "rojac70"

review: I kept debating  whether or not this would be a purchase worthy of buying but I must admit this is even better than my chromecast. Now I can FINALLY watch stuff on my Prime watch list on my tv. Only drawback: the way the stick is designed made it where I had to unplug my bluray player. That's why I was hesitant to buy it because of seeing previous reviews. But I'm satisfied. You just have to try it out for yourself.
author: tp78
